text: Joseph Raymond Wolfinger (born October 8, 1985) is an American professional basketball player for Gifu Swoops in Japan. ==References== ==External links== *The Citadel Bulldogs bio Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:American expatriate basketball people in Japan Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Oregon Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Gifu Swoops players Category:Nippon Tornadoes players Category:Otsuka Corporation Alphas players Category:Shinshu Brave Warriors players Category:Sportspeople from Portland, Oregon Category:The Citadel Bulldogs basketball players Category:Tokio Marine Nichido Big Blue players Category:Tokyo Cinq Rêves players Category:Tokyo Excellence players Category:Toyotsu Fighting Eagles Nagoya players Category:Washington Huskies men's basketball players
title: Joe Wolfinger
